ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: PROMIS substance in question (alcohol, drugs, etc.)
In the specified time period, have you used this substance?
In the specified time period, I felt that my substance use was out of control
Notes: 1=Not at all; 2=A little bit; 3=Somewhat; 4=Quite a bit; 5=Very much; 888 = Don't know; 999 = Refuse

ElementDescription: In the specified time period, my desire to use this substance seemed overpowering
Notes: 1=Not at all; 2=A little bit; 3=Somewhat; 4=Quite a bit; 5=Very much; 888 = Don't know; 999 = Refuse

ElementDescription: In the specified time period, this substance was the only thing I could think about
Notes: 1=Not at all; 2=A little bit; 3=Somewhat; 4=Quite a bit; 5=Very much; 888 = Don't know; 999 = Refuse

ElementDescription: In the specified time period, my substance use caused problems with people close to me
Notes: 1=Not at all; 2=A little bit; 3=Somewhat; 4=Quite a bit; 5=Very much; 888 = Don't know; 999 = Refuse

ElementDescription: In the specified time period, I had a substance use problem
Notes: 1=Not at all; 2=A little bit; 3=Somewhat; 4=Quite a bit; 5=Very much; 888 = Don't know; 999 = Refuse

ElementDescription: In the specified time period, I craved this substance
Notes: 1=Not at all; 2=A little bit; 3=Somewhat; 4=Quite a bit; 5=Very much; 888 = Don't know; 999 = Refuse

ElementDescription: In the specified time period, I spent a lot of time using this substance
Notes: 1=Not at all; 2=A little bit; 3=Somewhat; 4=Quite a bit; 5=Very much; 888 = Don't know; 999 = Refuse
